website_summaries.verdict: This is an ideal pick for men who prefer an alternative design to traditional wallets and like the idea of a money clip, but it's limited when it comes to safety and space.
pros: Generates compliments from men who love to use money clips and are thrilled about the workmanship of the quality leather
Powerful magnets keep bills in place
space for a few cards and an I.D
cons: Men who need to carry numerous cards – typically more than 4 – will likely find that many cards results in a tight fit

customer_reviews.title: ... been carrying for years but your price is much better but heres my problem with your design
customer_reviews.text: as soon as i saw this i knew i wanted it because this is the same kind i've been carrying for years but your price is much better but heres my problem with your design, the slots are way too tight too put more than one card per slot & even then its very difficult to get out, however i'm hoping they will stretch after a while. I could put several cards in my old one with no problem getting a card out. i love your design & the different compartments & i cant even tell its in my pocket' i will give you 5 stars based on the hope the slots will stretch. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Billy E Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Moldy and Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations of this product keeping in view the reviews. No, it is not even a good clip wallet: - Moldy: as soon as I open the package (at work) I smell mold - I tried to convince me otherwise but when a coworker who stopped by my office said your office smell like mold, I realized it is the wallet. - Poor workmanship: The seams already have threads popping out. - Very hard: Leather is a little too hard - may soften with time. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rashed Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Very functional - now I don't have to mess with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very functional - now I don't have to mess with those hard to use sleeves for my credit/debit cards as this one doesn't let the contents be scanned. Strong magnet for the money clip allows you to hold more bills then most. When I pulled it out of the box I keep all my stuff in at night (keys, wallet, wedding ring, etc.) my Swiss Army Knife was hanging off the outside of the money clip. That was a first!! Can also double as a refrigerator magnet.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, strong clip.
customer_reviews.text: The leather on the clip was soft and classy looking but the magnet was very strong. This is, then, a product that meets two important criteria for purchase: visual appeal and reliable functioning. I bought as gifts them for young men—grandsons or people who have particularly helped me. So far, we’ve gotten good reviews. While I’ll grant that part of the appeal is the soft brown leather—the color, that is—it’s a little too masculine—even by very liberal gender standards—to be appealing to many women. How about some simple colors for us. Red should be easy, and blue would be nice. I’d buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. JJ

customer_reviews.title: This Wallet Improves Hip and Back Pain! Really!!!
customer_reviews.text: It helps with hip and back pain. Carrying a wallet in your back pocket throws your hips out of square which it turn makes them hurt. In turn, you shift your weight to avoid the hip pain and now it's in your back. Been carrying one of these in my front pant pocket for about 2 years and will never go back to the old wallet in the hip pocket. I used to always carry my cash loose in my front pocket. Now, it's clipped in and with our digital payments, how many cards do you actually carry now? This is a good solution!
customer_reviews.author: The Truth 101

customer_reviews.title: P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart quite fast. Inner liner is made of very thin material that shreds during normal use, and makes the dividers useless. This is the second one I tried. The first fell apart so fast that they sent a replacement. I was told that I had received a wallet from a bad batch and the new one was made with better materials. This was B.S.. The replacement wallet fell apart just as fast as the first one, and in exactly the same manner. Don"t waste your money, this wallet is junk!
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I can't fault the magnets. They did seem to be strong enough to hold my bills in place. But the wallet itself was simply not enough to hold all the cards I carry. I only have one credit card and one debit card. The rest are things like drivers license, insurance cards, store cards, etc. Once I filled it with my cards, it was just bigger than what I wanted to put in my back pocket. I didn't have this same problem with the Coach wallet I was replacing. Just not a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Music Maven

customer_reviews.title: Great money clip and thin style
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this. I always used a magnet money clip but I was looking for something I could carry a credit card in that wasn't too thick. This is perfect. It will hold a lot of bills and still close and stay closed. I put my driver's license and two credit cards in it and it's still very thin and easy to carry in a front pocket. Will definitely get another when it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kopp

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I love my wallet! This thing is freaking perfect. I had the same bi-fold leather wallet for 4 years and decided it was time to upgrade and man I’m happy I did. The money clip is made from very strong magnets and there are just the right amount of pockets to keep the cards I need. No reason to have a cluttered wallet. We are grown ass men! (unless this is a lady reading this). Clean your self up!!
customer_reviews.author: Harrysun

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY LEATHER & POWERFUL MAGNET
customer_reviews.text: Money clip seemed to be made of a good, quality leather! Liked the visible ID slot on one side; hopefully, it lives up to the Electronic blocking claims. Comfortable holds 7 cards, 8, if you use the compacted-center compartment....just very, hard to remove! The magnet that holds up to 20 bills (half-folded) very securely!Would have given it 5 stars, but a slighty, thick profile; when carried in uour front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN'83

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Better Service
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought two of these money clips and both have treated me well. Good quality and not bulky. Has plenty of space for a decent number of cards and the magnet to hold cash is strong. Customer service is great and they actively care about the customer experience. It is the small things that bring me back to certain companies and this is certainly one of them. Keep up the good work and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect! Ordered for my son, who uses just one style; lightweight, front pocket, with room for bills and a few cards, featuring window for photo I.D. This wallet also has a magnet to secure the bills, an improvement over his old one. The card insert slots are a little snug, but will relax just enough with use. Quality of leather and general appearance are that of a much more expensive item. If wanted for a gift, it comes nicely packaged with gift box. Very pleased and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: I gave this gift to my Dad to replace the previous one that I gave to him. He likes it, and he has been able to put all of his credit cards and monetary bills without having any problems. For his previous one, I spent close to $100 at a very high-end store, but, the price on this was much less and the quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The wallet was a good product and after a mistake made by the delivery service (lost for a few days) a replacement was sent immediately. I received the original product and wanted to return one of them. I was told to keep them both. That was a very classy and generous offer. Nice to see a small efficient family operation. I hope to become a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: miket55

customer_reviews.title: seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my third wallet of this type and so far it seems like a very good product. The leather and stitching look good, and it did very well in a stress test with 20 bills in the money clip.
customer_reviews.author: Eman Laer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a pretty high quality products the magnet is very strong to hold many bills and place price is good and delivery was fast. I do however wish it would hold a few more cards but it's too tight for many, but that's okay, I needed to get rid of some stuff.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I like the wallet, being new I found it to be very stiff to pull out cards from the slots. I had an old wallet that had the money clip on the outside and I like the single wallet, but I wondered if I should have went with one where the money was on the inside(to hide cash bette) even though I do like the single wallet and not having to deal with a fold. I like the real leather, I expect to last many years. It seems to be of a good quality leather so far and I expect it to hold. I do like having the ability to see my ID through a clear window.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin E Turner

customer_reviews.title: High quality leather money clip that doesn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a Birthday gift for my hubby, who needed a new money clip to replace his worn out one. He was pleasantly surprised, as well as I, with the quality of this money clip wallet combo. The rare earth money clip magnet was advertised as being very strong and it certainly fit the bill (no pun intended)! Additionally the wallet has several pockets which was a nice surprise. Overall, we were both very satisfied with this product, and would highly recommend it if you are in the market for a high quality leather money clip that doesn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: patrice m. palmer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really like mine, In fact I just ordered two more for friends who saw mine and mentioned it's exactly what they were looking for as well. The magnetic money clip is very strong and although some of the card slots were a bit snug when I first received it, they'll loosen up quickly with use. It had a rather strong smell out of the box BUT you have to keep in mind it's leather and the smell will dissipate quickly. I've looked at dozens of this style of wallet for weeks and glad I finally decided on the Viosi.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: More than what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made wallet with money clip. The leather seems to be of good or better quality. Craftsmanship is high quality with straight and consistent stitching. We need more products made in the USA made like this.
customer_reviews.author: reschooler00

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet, a few petty annoyances!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little wallet to keep in my front pocket. The first few weeks, I had no issues. As I started accumulating cards(I have about 8-10 cards, between credit cards, insurance, rewards cards, etc) space became pretty tight, but that was to be expected. On a few trips where I was staying in hotels, I always instinctively put my room key on my wallet. Both cases, the magnet in this thing stripped the cards and I had to go to the front desk and get replacements. So that is a pain, but my credit cards have had no issues. Also, random things stick to my leg, like my keys, walking past a metal file cabinet, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CC37

customer_reviews.title: Strongest magnet, cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: The magnet was the strongest of the wallets I tried but it doesn’t feel as nice as other leather wallets. Also the magnet is protruding and I can see it over time wearing down and falling out. It can hold quite a bit and does have a center pocket.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: ... my nephew's high school graduation present instead of a boring card with money in it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my nephew's high school graduation present instead of a boring card with money in it. First, it can hold quite a few bills and still be slim and compact. I put several bills in the wallet and then slid it back in the box. Okay, perhaps that was more for my gag part of the present. Secondly, the gift box is classy looking and not like a dime store gift box. Overall, I am happy with the purchase and the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: As an added bonus he can still easily carry his id and debit card
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my 30 year-old son. He had asked for a money clip but I took a chance and purchased this wallet and it he absolutely loves it. He said the magnet is very strong and he doesn't have to worry about his money slipping out. As an added bonus he can still easily carry his id and debit card. The item came packaged well and was received earlier than expected. If you are on the fence, I say go for it. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Helm

customer_reviews.title: and since owning the wallet it has worked pretty well. Strong enough to fit a good stack ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this wallet for a couple days, and since owning the wallet it has worked pretty well. Strong enough to fit a good stack of bills, 3 cards by the money clip and i love the ID window on the back. Very easy to slide the ID out. It's a little wider then I thought but for the price it's a good wallet. Unfortunately only thing stopping it from being a 5 star is getting cards out is a pain. I think I am going to try a more expensive wallet like Ridge Wallet.
customer_reviews.author: BelieveInAndr3w

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist wallet
customer_reviews.text: I'll never go back to a centerfold wallet. The magnet that hold the cash is strong. It's a little odd adjusting to having visible cash- there may be a security issue there in the wrong neighborhood. As somebody who hates having things in my pocket, this wallet is mostly unobtrusive. It forced me carry only essential items. Will buy this wallet again if it ever wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Snakob

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to find something slightly smaller than my wallet and a little bigger than simply a money clip. This leather money clip with magnet did just the trick. I have used it for 10 days now and really enjoy it. The magnet is very strong, and in addition to at least five to seven bills, I have been able to carry three credit cards, my license, two work ids, my insurance card, and three business cards.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It
customer_reviews.text: Well made, handsome wallet that is easy to use. I saw other reviews on here stating that the magnet isn't strong, and I'm sure its possible that the magnet quality could vary, but I found mine to be very strong. I used this wallet for over 3 years and did experience some internal ripping after a while, but any wallet you buy is going to get worn after a couple years, and I keep mine in my back pocket, putting extra wear on it. I liked it so much I bought a second one. If that isn't a 5 star review, I don't know what is!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montaruli

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves it! I think its so cool that the earth magnets work so well, you can't pull money out unless you take off the clip. Really helps make sure you aren't losing money in the process of taking it out of your pocket. He loves the smell too - definitely genuine leather. Great product! Very glad I bought it and if something happens to this one, you can bet I will order another!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. While this wallet/money clip will most likely be too small for everyday use for him, I think it will be convenient when traveling or going somewhere when you do not want to carry all of your credit cards. It is slim and could easily fit in a front pocket of his pants for security. The magnetic clip is pretty strong. My order arrived earlier than expected and in perfect condition. It was exactly as described. A quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyrae

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Front Pocket Bill Fold Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a front pocket wallet billfold since my last one just wore out. I couldn't find what I wanted locally so I did an Amazon search and found this one. It is fantastic. The clip is magnetized so it opens all the way to remove bills, and if your worried that it is not strong enough to hold down your money, worry no more! The magnet is super strength, and there are plenty of pockets to slide in my cards. I would give this 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this thing multiple times but nothing fits in it. I bought it because I like to avoid the George Kastanza wallet and keep it tight and simple. You can fit a few CCs in here and your DL nothing else. The pocket for extra items is too small to hold anything else. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Pow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased (wore the other one out after 4-5 years of constant use)! Love it! I will keep buying this until they stop making them! It's compact, yet holds all I need it to hold. The money clip is strong and will hold all the cash I need, and I do mean all! Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Defect item
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this wallet for 2 days and it has already ripped at the seam or came un glued.. Cheap material but looks like a good sturdy wallet with a nice money clip. I wish a seller like this would contact me back.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used a front pocket wallet for several years and when it wore out it took me a while to find the right sized one. also the magnety is critical. This product holds 4 credit cards in the slots behind the cash, another 4 in the side pocket area and it will still hold at least 10-15 various denomination bills. Literally fold over 15 one dollar bills no problem, magnet holds firmly. This is my second on, I ordered .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality.  Holds fewer cards than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: If you only want to carry 4-5 cards (including ID) this wallet has you covered. The magnet is strong, the wallet looks decent, and appears overall to be of reasonable quality. All of the card pockets are incredibly tight and even a few weeks later it's a struggle to get cards in and out. Serves a purpose for now, but not likely to carry it for long.
customer_reviews.author: SKA

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket wallet is a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this front pocket money clip wallet for a gift. Seems to be well made of quality leather with a few pockets for credit cards and a place for an ID card or license. The leather is a bit stiff making it difficult to insert cards into pockets but should become more pliable over time and use. Overall a good option if you don't want to carry a wallet in your back pocket. Shipping was fast and packaging was secure.
customer_reviews.author: P. Morris

customer_reviews.title: great wallet
customer_reviews.text: ok i purchased 5 wallets because i was tired of carrying my cards and money all loose in my pocket yes i have a wallet but that is way to bulky for my everyday use. this wallet is great for id and four cards stays slim and does not bulge the magnet money clip seems secure but i havent used the wallet yet just received it. i also bought THE RIDGE from there website. so out of all the slim wallets i have purchased ive kept these two good luck
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Back Pocket Wallet Users Can CONVERT with this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bet my boyfriend he would switch from a back wall user to a front pocket wallet user. He never thought he would convert. Almost a year later he's still using this wallet and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The hubby loves it! The magnet is strong and hold his bills perfectly! My husband cannot stand wallets that are folded up as it takes up too much space in his pocket and is not comfortable when he sits!
customer_reviews.author: JessC

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming apart around card holder
customer_reviews.text: I did like until stiching started coming apart around the place where you hold my debit cards it was very disappointing this is happening I think I might of got a lemon but I really do like it what can I do to get a refund or a new one
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality and is SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, but I think it is exactly what I wanted. I read that the magnet is not so good, but it seems very strong to me. Also, the overall clip size is not much bigger than a folded dollar bill. So, it fits well in the front pocket and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Lao Wai

customer_reviews.title: Only wallet I have used for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an old order when I came across this and was surprised it has been 4 years since i bought it. Magnet still strong enough to have no problems. I have not been kind to this wallet and it has held up pretty well although I may buy a new wallet now that I have realized I have had the same wallet for over 4 years now!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Henckel

customer_reviews.title: Husband is happy
customer_reviews.text: It fits about 10 cards and some cash. The magnetic clip is heavy duty so you can stick quite a bit of cash in there and it doesn't feel like it will fall out. Overall husband is happy with it and it's a nice wallet. I would recommend it to others. Update: I changed my review from 4 to 5 stars because my husband made me track down and find this wallet I bought a couple of years earlier. I bought him one similar to this one and he wasn't very happy. He likes this one that much. He is again happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: As described. I’d buy again but for someone else.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool. Feels nice. Couldn’t tell you how it works. Was an xmas stuffer for husband and he’s never used it so maybe not his style idk. Makes sense to me to have a money clip instead of loose money in a pocket but hey what do I know ?
customer_reviews.author: StacyYvonne87

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a high quality wallet. When I first received it and loaded my cards and cash, everything was so tight I had difficulty removing my most used cards. However, with just a bit of use, things have loosened up a bit and the cards are very easy to remove when I want to use them, but they stay safely tucked in their slot when not in use. It fits my pocket nicely and is not bulky at all. Currently, I have seven cards and about $100 cash in small bills. The magnets hold very nicely. I like the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Buster

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a similar wallet (leather and magnetic money clip). Issues with my old one were the magnet being too weak for bills and the pockets for the credit cards not being strong enough at the edges (started folding in). This one solves both issues. Magnet is strong and does catch metal objects through your pocket but I’d rather deal with that they the clip coming undone and money going everywhere. Definitely a great buy on this one, especially the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnet and decent construction. I did end up purchasing and using a different wallet of the same style but different manufacturer which I preferred. The area in which the DL would most likely go is a little wider than I was hoping for. Card pockets are extremely tight and did not stretch out during the first month- This could be good or bad depending on your application. I need the wallet to carry at minimum 10 cards.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Nash

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Front Pocket Wallet Solution for Those Who Carry Cash and Cards
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best front pocket ID, credit card holder, and money clips I have owned. I just had to discipline myself to not carry as much junk in my wallet. I was initially a bit worried about the rare earth magnet, but so far have not messed up any credit cards or hotel room keys.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible money clip.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I got this today, loaded it with three cards and took the money out of my wallet and started loading that and the magnet (or the design) is so poor it only holds about 12 US bills in the money "clip" securely. I'm being pretty generous with the word securely too. I have no idea who they made this for but it doesn't hold enough US cash for me. On the plus side it is cheap, has a window for your drivers license and looks nice if not great.
customer_reviews.author: NWPILOT

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wallet in person. Has held up well and I was very impressed by the magnet strength. the rfid blocking definitely works. I've always kept the key card to my office in my wallet and held the wallet up to unlock the door. With this wallet it wont read it. I have to remove the badge
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY WALLETS ONLY
customer_reviews.text: First, let me just say this wallet is made from quality stuff. I’ve spent more money on other name brand wallets with the same or even less quality material. But now that i know the craftsmanship that come with all Viosi wallets that all changes from this point on. This review is for anyone who is skeptical of purchasing this wallet and to help them have some type of shopping confidence with this company. You won’t be disappointed trust me. GREAT JOB Viosi for being an honest and Hard working company to all your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Hector C.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to slim down how much you carry
customer_reviews.text: Pro's - 6 Different slots for your credit cards, license, other cards - 3 of those slots you can hold multiply cards in - Very light and easy to carry around - Magnetic bar is solid Con's - If you have a fat wad of cash the clip has trouble closing (I dont carry that much cash but if you just took a large out from the bank/atm there might be an issue) - Magnetic clip is guaranteed to deactivate your hotel key card (Travelers beware) Overall: - Love it. Easy to put in cards. Easy to take out. Strong magnetic clip. Solid Buy
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Strong Clip, Delivers as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Clip very strong and holds many bills. Leather is nice. Limited number of credit card slots so plan on using this primarily for money clip with a couple of credit cards, insurance cards etc., Reason for 4 stars is that the interior pocket is on the small side and difficult to regular business sized cards in and out
customer_reviews.author: sdjer

customer_reviews.title: This turned out to be a very nice wallet for carrying money and credit cards
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a very nice wallet for carrying money and credit cards. The clip is vey secure holding folding money in place. The credit card slots are separated so you can see what card you are removing. The wallet is not flimsy in any way and the quality of the Leather is good. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great money clip!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this money clip for my partner for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. Sometimes if the clip is in his pocket, it will get stuck to the dishwasher door and it's literally strong enough to pull the door open, so no worries about it not being a strong enough magnet to hold your cash in place LOL. Otherwise, he loves how discreet it is & the fact that it holds every card that he regularly carries around with him. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of sitting on my old wallet and decided to try a money clip to keep in my front pocket. This Viosi clip was the one I chose over all the other choices. I'm very pleased with this product. It's just as advertised. Very good quality and not too small and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: hwy58

customer_reviews.title: Light and convenient, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy. From the unboxing the leather is extremely tight. It's rather difficult at first to get credit cards and I.D's into the slots. But it is "breaking in" slowly. Still, worth the investment to have it. The magnet is stong and holds folded bill securely. Quality is great and the wallet itself is so lite and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: ... this wallet and another to compare which one i liked better and then return the loser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet and another to compare which one i liked better and then return the loser. This one was the loser. The money clip was great. The little opening to slide out a card/ID on one side is awesome. That feature alone was the strong case to keep this one. The deciding factor however was the card slots. If your a guy that needs to carry more than 4 or 5 cards, this wallet will not fit them all. I found the card slots to be on the smaller side and after 5 or 6 different cards (ID, credit, debit, AAA, loyalty cards) it just felt too stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: didn't last long would not recommed Got it Dec 29 2016 came apart March 1 2017
customer_reviews.text: got it love it seems like good quality and exactly what I was looking for was hard to find in store. glad I found it on amazon. Ok up date this money clip. it came apart on the enter seam last week went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: wn

customer_reviews.title: Save your backside! Go front pocket with this great wallet - incredible quality and utility for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ideal size for a front pocket wallet. Easily holds 3 readily accessible credit cards, plus Drivers License and a few extra bonus cards (health insurance ID, e.g.). The cards can sometimes be a little hard to extract with bills in the magnetic clamp, but this is easily managed. Just be sure not to put your magnetic strip parking tickets in the same pocket! They will be degmagged by this wallet. But, this replaced a Luis Vitton rear pocket wallet that is still going strong after 10 years of use, but is not as comfortable to carry, nor as safe. I'd buy this unit again anytime.
customer_reviews.author: gleebi

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an upcoming trip. I have not used it as of yet. Seems to be durable and well made. The test will be upcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet caused problems with hotel key card.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wallet for a trip to Italy. The magnet is very strong and holds plenty cash. Held my drivers license and a few credit cards I needed very well. The magnet caused my hotel card to not work. Had the front desk give me two replacement keys before I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: R. Orzabal

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets. Can hold a good amount of cash
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good magnets. Can hold a good amount of cash. Have to be careful not to put hotel room key cards in the same pocket or you get locked out. Photo ID space is a bit small. The ID gets pushed up. Not afraid it will get lost, just can't always see the ID stuff when you show it. The top pockets are a bit tight. I hold weekly receipts in them, and it gets hard to stuff them in by Thursday. Overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: lars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product & very dependable to keep the most important things accessible & available... Diminishes hip & back pain as well...
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good product @ great price
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I anticipated, replaced a single sleeve card holder billfold that was stretched out after years of use/abuse and fit everything perfectly. Hoping this stretches a bit to fit more cards/ids. Makes me laugh when my keyring sticks to the billfold, that is one strong magnet. Seems like top quality construction, but still breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle P.

customer_reviews.title: ... lost) and the magnet that was on it was horrible. After reading some reviews on this wallet some ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a front pocket wallet for x-mas (can't remember the name and now its lost) and the magnet that was on it was horrible. After reading some reviews on this wallet some people said the magnet was not good at all. I ordered it anyway and couldn't be happier with the product. Only downfall is the 2 side pockets are a little bit tight, but thats expected. The magnet hold 10 bills easily and I don't carry a load of cash so its perfect to me. The magnet strength on this wallet is pretty good, at least to me, as it sticks to other metal objects while in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: kenne anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... was a Birthday gift for my gentleman and I loved it when I received it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday gift for my gentleman and I loved it when I received it, hoping with all of my heart that he would love it. And he does!!!! The magnet holds money very tight and he loves the leather and the pockets for Driver's License and credit cards. In our minds, nothing needs ANY improvement. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good for Front Pocket Use
customer_reviews.text: The construction of the wallet is pretty good. I don't usually carry much cash so I keep a few bills in the large(ish) back slot, and use the clip to hold it in my shirt pocket for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: William Petree

customer_reviews.title: Be cooler than you are.
customer_reviews.text: Get this wallet. Men will want to be you. Women will want to be with you. Sometimes vice-versa.
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: I love this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is so good, I just ordered a replacement, after 2 years, and decided to stay with it. The only reason I ordered a replacement is because the clear ID film turned cloudy. The rest was still great!
customer_reviews.author: jimmy311

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little bigger but so far this has held up the longest for my fiancé. He does construction and needed something that was durable. This definitely is.
customer_reviews.author: Heather mclean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this produce daily for over six months now. I am very happy with it. The magnet is strong enough to hold any amount of bills that I have put in. I think the most I have done to this point is 15. I have six cards in it not counting my ID and it seems to hold them perfectly. I carry it in my front pocket and it is incredibly unobtrusive. I would recommend this to anyone that wants a front pocket wallet and doesn't feel the need to carry too many cards.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Well made and strong magnet. Certainly eliminates clutter because you will only be able to fit necessities into it. This is not a derogatory statement, it is a fact and I appreciate the wallet for helping me to eliminate unnecessary things.
customer_reviews.author: donoh42

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally pleased!
customer_reviews.text: When my $ stash dwindled to a few bills, they'd slip off my old folder and hide down in the bottom of my right back pocket. Problem solved with the force 10 magnet in this dude. There are ample and compartmentalized slots for cards, too. Last, but not least, I think the price is right for this quality product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Snyder, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my life
customer_reviews.text: After several years of leaving my enormous bifold stingray wallet in the car I decided to trade in the wallet and business card case for a front pocket wallet. I love this thing. I feel condensed and simplifyed. Everything I need including a fee business cards right where I need it, and it feels more secure to boot. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son-in-law and he uses it every day and likes it very much. My son-in-law liked it so well I decided to buy one for myself and it is great. Only knock is pockets are super tight and hard to get cards in and out. Hopefully this will improve with wear. Update: Less than two years and worn out, torn from tight fit so it did not improve with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: makes my butt a lot smaller ...love this thing
customer_reviews.text: iam supprsie that the magent on this thing doesnt actually destroy my card but actually puts a magnetic protection around it instead .... it say on a paper .... it actaully very nice fuction to have your card protection by magnet ... been using for a week now and have no problems with it ... I threw out my old big wallet when i got this thing ..... love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Information on Amazon webaite was incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The item purchased was not anything at all like what I thought I was purchasing. It actually had no room for a drivers license, a couple of credit cards and a couple of medical cards. I will be returning this item as soon as I can get a shipping label and get it back to you. Then I will purchase a real men's wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: bought the money clip for my girl friend and it was such a great product her friends wanted one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh

customer_reviews.title: space for 1 or 2 seldem used like certifications,
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had ditched the thick as a brick wallet years ago. This does not hold all the stuff I used to carry , but it does hold all I need to carry. Magnets are strong enough to hold a dozen bills folded , ID window pocket , 2 or 3 frequently used cards , space for 1 or 2 seldem used like certifications , ,front pocket carry. Heavy everyday use , leather is of good quality and is not showing any wear.
customer_reviews.author: David W Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet and well constructed wallet, given the price.
customer_reviews.text: Magnet is strong, and the card slots are big enough for ID, credit cards, etc. I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. Pretty good workmanship for the price. I was apprehensive at first with the negative reviews (weak magnet, bad construction, etc), but, those reviews are not true. Truly, a strong magnet (Probably Neodymium, the most affordable type of rare-earth magnets) (Nd2Fe14B, in case you're interested), holds all his cards and bills. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Catherine W.

customer_reviews.title: Solid wallet
customer_reviews.text: Really getting a bang for you buck with this wallet. - Leather is nice in person - Cards fit nice and tight nothing is loose or flimsy - Big enough to hold all your cards and not have to fold bills multiple times to cram into it like other minimalist wallets - But small enough where it isn't bulky in your pocket at all - Magnet holds cash down very well - So far the magnet has not messed with the chips in my card, major plus - RFID
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I wasn't sure at first with the money clip part of the wallet, but it has worked great. I totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dietzenbach

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Helps prevent hip/back pain while keeping most important items readily available & accessible...
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: For cash and 3-4 credit cards only, more than 4 credit cards it is no good.
customer_reviews.text: Leather is nice and it seems to be well made BUT if you want to put more than 4 credit cards in it don't buy it. It does not hold the cards well, they are stuck in there like glue after 4. Threw my Fossil one that i had for 6 years away and now wish I would have kept that one and returned this one. Fossil hold 8=9 credit cards without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Malecki

customer_reviews.title: Really like the Viosi
customer_reviews.text: Really like the Viosi. With products like this, you either like it or hate it...depends on your requirements. I like to use a product before writing a review and now it has been used for several weeks. This wallet is a bit bigger than the one it replaced. However, it fits nicely in my pocket and I don't even notice it's there. I tend to carry only the necessary amount of cards and cash keeping the profile small. Very strong, snug money clip. The Viosi allows me to easily organized carried items and locate them quickly. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: William Brown

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves this for when we travel or trips downtown where he doesn't want the wallet in the back pocket. Great for front pocket an the magnet is awesome! It will demagnetize hotel keys so fyi.
customer_reviews.author: nancyntenn

customer_reviews.title: Oh yea!!! I found it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm the biggest pain in the @$% when it comes to wallets. I like minimalist things in my pockets. Knives, wallets, etc. This one is by far my all time favorite. It's starting to break in very nicely and love the fact that it's well made. No signs of wear and the magnet is strong enough to hold a decent stack of cash. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: clotilde s. palermo

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the wallet
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the wallet. Looks nice and is thin when reasonably loaded which is what I was looking for. I don't get the transparent ID slot, I'd rather that be all leather......but maybe because I'm too old to be carded at a bar. TSA certainly won't view ID through a "window". Overall, I think it is a great value for the money and is far less obvious in my pocket than my previous wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Tackle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build with easy access to all my stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great front pocket wallet! Easy access, strong magnet, low-profile. Great looking piece with quality construction. I would buy one again, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JetJockey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Small & still has room for quite a few card. Love the strong magnets, despite what you may read in the reviews about the magnets demagnetizing credit /ATM cards I have had zero issues with this. I have been using it for the last 4 months all my credit cards & debit cards work fine and I have had no problems. I will most definitely buy this one again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Norander

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This money clip credit card holder is everything iit claims to be. The magnet clip will hold at least 25 folded bills and has slots for 3 cards plus a clear window for your drivers license. Also a small slot for a couple business cards. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: OceansideGary

customer_reviews.title: Very nice front pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ID slot with the window,no need to pull it out. Plenty of card slots and a real strong magnet on the bill holder. Cards are a little tight to get out but should get better once its broke in.
customer_reviews.author: crazipainter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is strong and the quality overall is phenomenal. I gave this to my husband as a gift and he loved it. He is hard to buy for, but this is one of the few gifts that he raved about.
customer_reviews.author: SparkyPants

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Replaced the docker one of similar design. This one is way better quality and function. The magnet is stronger and holds more cash.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Great magnet!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. It's well made, has room for three credit cards and my ID card, but best of all is the magnet on the money clip. It is very strong and I will not have to be concerned about bills slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: PAT17RICK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: He loves this! Holds everything he needs and nothing he doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this wallet and recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Cards are kind of hard to get out; perhaps just needs a break in period. Other than that I really like it! Went from really big wallet to this one so smaller size is nice! Magnetic money clip works just as well as advertised! Enough slots to hold all of my main cards with room for more. If you have a lot of other cards like library, shopping, membership etc. etc., like I do, then you just need to plan use of the remaining slots accordingly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Thin Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great for guys who are part of the thin wallet club. Fits well in front pocket. As an FYI the magnet erases hotel magnet door keys (if you travel a lot this may not be the right wallet). If they still sold without RFID I would have gotten that, I live in Chicago and now have to pull out my train/bus card rather than just tapping my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

product_meta.title: VIOSI Money Clip Leather Wallet For Men Slim Front Pocket Credit Card Holder with Powerful RARE EARTH Magnets
feature_bullets: 💳 FUNCTIONAL – VIOSI front pocket wallet is made from the genuine cowhide leather with magnetic money clip. Money clip wallet has 3 card slots, 2 larger slots and 1 transparent ID window. One side of the wallet includes an exterior magnetic money clip allows you to clip cash, bills, receipt or ticket inside your wallet. The slim wallet is ideal for carrying business cards, credit and debit cards.

💳 MUST HAVE – Humanized design and easy to use, have a compact slim wallet and carry it in front pocket, these credit card holder holds cash and a good number of cards plus center larger slots for either another card or two, or receipts, doesn't bulk your pocket, leave your burdens down and hang out light. Our credit card wallet is stylish, elegant, feels soft and is easy to carry and exquisite. It is an essential product for men.

💳 YOU WORK HARD FOR YOUR MONEY – That’s why we use 2 – 20mm Rare Earth Magnets to hold on to your cash. We tested the rest and now you can buy the best. Rare-Earth magnets were developed in the 70’s and are made from alloys of rare earth elements. They are the strongest type of permanent magnets. Our slim magnetic money clip design is extremely functional and impressively minimal conveniently allowing (Every Day Carry) of your credit cards, cash and ID.

💳 SUPERIOR QUALITY – Unlike other magnetic wallets that can be poorly made or have weak magnets, our first class design solves these problems as the VIOSI magnetic money clip wallet is constructed of only the best materials, oversized super-strong earth magnets & top quality cow leathers / linings that will last for years. The slim credit card holder ensures comfortable carrying in any pocket-no more back pocket bulge.
